Class UnderlyingOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.specialfunctions.Library

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HankelFunctions, ModifiedFirstKind, ModifiedSecondKind, OrdinaryFirstKind, OrdinarySecondKind, SphericalFirstKind, SphericalSecondKind

    public abstract class UnderlyingOperators
extends Library
    common math formulas for Bessel functions

    Michael Druckman

      • sumOfTerms

        public static <T> Polynomial.PowerFunction<T> sumOfTerms(int initialPowX,
                                                         int initialPow2,
                                                         int termCount,
                                                         java.lang.Number polynomialOrder,
                                                         PolynomialSpaceManager<T> psm,
                                                         boolean modified,
                                                         UnderlyingOperators.GammaSum<T> gamma)
        loop for term construction of polynomial
        Type Parameters:
        T - data type manager
        Parameters:
        initialPowX - the power of X in the first term
        initialPow2 - the power of 2 in the first denominator
        termCount - the number of terms to include in the polynomial
        polynomialOrder - the highest exponent value of the polynomial
        psm - a space manager for polynomial management
        gamma - the function to use for Gamma
        modified - negation term removed
        Returns:
        the constructed polynomial
